game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find it and bring it back.

task.description: Talk to villagers and search for any clues that might lead you to the ruins.
Navigate the treacherous jungle and find a way into the ruins.
Explore the ruins and uncover the hidden artifact.
